DOC.detailed_description: This study Randomized Clinical Trial , individual morbid obesity , consist 3 group : 1 . Group 1 ( G1 EXERCISE ) : This group participate physical exercise program twice week hospital . 2 . Group 2 ( G2 - LIFESTYLE AND EXERCISE ) : This group receive G1 intervention associate weekly group follow technique cognitive behavioral therapy psychologist 3 . Group 3 ( G3 - CONTROL ) : This group keep medical appointment information routine procedure hospital . Will include study individual morbid obesity contraindication practice low-intensity exercise . Exclusion criterion contraindication physical exercise , individual cardiovascular disease reduce functional capacity ( class III IV New York Heart Association ) , orthopedic problem , severe retinopathy , severe neuropathy , drug addict severe mental illness , metabolic blood pressure decompensated .
